primaryTopic.definition: The New South Wales Department of Planning and Environment (DPE) is a department of the New South Wales Government, responsible for effective and sustainable planning to support the growth in the state of New South Wales, Australia. The department was renamed from the Department of Planning, Industry and Environment (DPIE) on 21 December 2021, when development of industry function was transferred to the new Department of Regional NSW. (Courtesy of Wikipedia)

prefLabel._value: Department of Planning and Environment (DPE), New South Wales Government
